title: BitcSeo
author: BitcSeo
content: â–¡â– ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹I will help promote your channel in form of a sponsored ads on youtube and fb platform(s)magnitize small banners which will stands out like a paid ads.Pls, get in contact with me via pm with details of your business for us to get started.â– â–¡ã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€Šã€ŠRegardsBitcseo

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: It is nice you have a good business proposal but it is unfortunate that your reputation here has issues when I checked your profile. Normally, people would be extremely cautious dealing if they think of that here. If you can have any reputable member here to vouch for your previous works then I believe the scepticism would be minimal but even at then members would still thread with caution.Escrow would have been better if you had mentioned it for members to take note of because nobody would have the thought of doing anything with you when it comes to financial dealings but if you implore the services of a well established and reputable member here, I think you would scale through successfully.Lastly you will have to make known your fee and accepted payment medium ie the currency you would like to receive your payment with.

comments.author: BitcSeo
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on August 01, 2023, 11:11:25 AMIt is nice you have a good businessÂ  scale through successfully.Lastly you will have to make known your fee and accepted payment medium ie the currency you would like to receive your payment with.Thanks for your comment and observations. The service is limited to business within specific niches. Not all online businesses are compatible when it comes to promotion on social media platform(s). This is the reason why i never mention price nor any form of payment.â– The first procedure, involve analysing customer's online biz in order to check if, thisÂ  is the right form of marketing .â–¡The second procedure is where we talk about price, form of payment (escrow) based on the outcome of the 1st procedure.â–¡â– ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹Lastly, anyone who has been on this forum btw 2016,2017....2019 knows howÂ  the trust system has been misuse in the past 3-4 yrs. I think there is a little bit of improvement now.Final note: a few vouched copy will be offered to hero/leggendary members. Unfortunatly, I canmot put so muchÂ  time and effort to work for free. â– â–¡ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹ã€‹RegardsBitcseo

If you say a few vouched copies would be given to only hero and legendary members do you mean these sets of members within these ranks are the only ones you would accept offer from? Because I believe there are other members here below that rank that would likely want to patronise your services do you mean they too would not get vouched copies from you as well because most people you see here are institutions on their own and looking for deals and offers to present.Lastly, it is good you made mention your procedure and escrow services and I will advise you edit your post and put it there appropriately for viewers to have a first eye glance on it before any other thing.I will also point out the fact that you quoted meÂ  wrongly as what I saw from the quote is not what was there. You did that intentionally so I will advise you do the corrections.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: It is nice you listen to advise. That would put you up on track. You said you are only experimenting it here but you should know very well that anything presentable here is worth presenting and as such should be well presented so the idea of experimentation here seems more of a joke because no one would likely take it serious since you want to do such possibly it might end up being a review for you.Building a good project takes time of which I am fully aware of but the process should be such that can give room for review because from such you could be able to go back to do more working based on the outcome of the review. If big projects could pay for review on this platform, you too are not exempted. So now you see the essence of review in projects.Lastly, like I said initially, your first quote was not appropriately done, you joined two different statement from the first and second paragraphs of my post together for your own gain making it looks like I said it straight in one sentence which is wrong. You want to make people see it like I made the comment that way.Quote from: BitcSeo on August 02, 2023, 10:20:03 AMQuote from: CryptSafe on August 01, 2023, 07:08:27 PMQuote from: BitcSeo on August 01, 2023, 06:13:27 PMQuote from: CryptSafe on August 01, 2023, 11:11:25 AMIt is nice you have a good businessÂ  scale through successfully.Lastly you will have to make known your fee and accepted payment medium ie the currency you would like to receive your payment with.Thanks for your comment and observations.
